title: Soldiers Of Anarchy-FLT
description: Soldiers of Anarchy is a real-time squad-based tactics game set in the near future. Civilization as we know it has been wiped out by a genetically engineered disease and the paranoia in the aftermath. Death counts are over millions and countries had to take drastic measures like sending nukes to their own cities. A small group of soldiers and scientists has managed to survive in a military bunker, but barely. After ten years, the group decides they can not take the boredom of sitting in the bunker anymore so they decide to investigate the surrounding area.
